io.atomix.copycat.session

Class Event<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atomix.copycat.session.Event<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CatalystSerializable

    public class Event<T>
extends Object
implements CatalystSerializable
    Transports a named event from a server to a client Session.

    Events are published by server state machines to client sessions as event objects. Each event sent to a session is associated with a String event name and value.

    Author:
    See Also:
